text: Andrew Peter Harris (born January 25, 1957) is an American Republican politician and physician. He has been the U.S. representative for since 2011. He is the only Republican member of Maryland's congressional delegation. Harris was first elected to Congress in 2010, after beating Democratic incumbent Frank Kratovil in the general election. Harris became the chair of the House Freedom Caucus in September 2024, after his predecessor, Bob Good, lost his Republican primary in June 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Andy Harris official U.S. House website * Andy Harris for Congress * * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Maryland Category:American physicians Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Andy Harris (politician)
